title: Web Designer Needed
job_overview:
Hi! We are looking for an experienced Web Designer to join our team.

*PLEASE READ CAREFULLY OR YOUR APPLICATION MIGHT NOT BE CONSIDERED*

We are seeking a detail-oriented Web Designer with a robust skill set in Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign, supported by a strong portfolio of work.

It is mandatory for each applicant to work on a trial assignment for this position. (2 hours max)

We are paying 9 USD per hour, and we can match your time availability with a number of projects each day.
This is a long term opportunity and as such there will be many opportunities for promotions, increased responsibilities, and growth within BuzzCube.

Please include your portfolio when applying, let us know what kind of experience you have with Web Design, Graphic Design, UX/UI Design and any other relevant experience, and apply using "Web Designer For BuzzCube" as subject line - IF ANY OF THESE INFO ARE MISSING, YOUR APPLICATION WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.

Thank you,
Matt - CEO and Founder of BuzzCube
Giada - Hiring Manager at BuzzCube

(more info on our company can be found at Upgrade to see actual info)
